Title: Erratum: Publisher Correction: Learning the value of information and reward over time when solving exploration-exploitation problems (Scientific reports (2017) 7 1 (16919))
Abstract: A correction to this article has been published and is linked from the HTML and PDF versions of this paper. The error has been fixed in the paper.
